content: Is there a way in GB2 to have a single FSH aliases file that can be used for all resources?
Not at the moment - but it's a good idea. I could add it to the project (and maybe have some 'standard' ones for snomed, loinc etc)...
FWIW, i like to have a single FSH (or a few if it's big) for commons - common aliases, common rule sets, etc.

Yeah - I need to think on the best way to do this. Currently I'm using the API to process a single FSH file at a time - but it can do a collection of files, so there's nothing technically preventing adding a common file at the time of generation...
Hi @David Hay has been this feature added ? (i.e define the FSH aliases in a single file)
I think so, when you create a new project in GB2, there is a tab "Common FSH"
Yep - seems to be working fine. Not sure if there was an issue in the past - but working now...
